about_the_game:
Dark Manor is a single-player, first-person horror game. Explore the manor and collect the amulets that will allow you to escape this cursed place. Different types of monsters and creatures inhabit this old, dilapidated mansion, and you'll need to avoid them to successfully make your escape.

EXPLORE, LEARN, WIN

Your first journey in the manor will start as an exploration. Then, death after death, you will learn how to avoid your enemies and discover their weaknesses. Sooner or later, the manor will turn into a race against time and death, and it is up to you to master it.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR PLAYSTYLE

  • In for a quick game? Or maybe you want to take your time? Choose the number of amulets you will need to retrieve to find your way out.

  • Play with your controller or keyboard (Azerty and Qwerty ready).

  • Choose the difficulty that suits you best: While the main monster will always haunt your steps, you can activate or deactivate other monsters if they bother you. Especially if you're arachnophobic, don’t worry! You can remove spiders from the game via the main menu !

VARIOUS MONSTERS

Every monster has a different way of finding you. While some will rely only on their sight, others will be sensitive to light, sound, or the speed of your movements. So be careful—if you break something loudly or run around too much, you might just wake something up !

TRY SOMETHING DIFFERENT

Whether you own a powerful or basic computer, you can enjoy Dark Manor’s optimized map. Set the settings to "Low" and unlock a whole new hidden level !


Now it's up to you, but be careful... the manor has its own rules.

Good luck!

name: Dark Manor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: can run on lower setting with : Intel(R) N97 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: can run on lower setting with : Intel(R) UHD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E5-2667 v3 @ 3.20GHz 3.20 GHz or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or more
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dark Manor is a single-player, first-person horror game. Explore the manor and collect the amulets that will allow you to escape this cursed place. Different types of monsters and creatures inhabit this old, dilapidated mansion, and you'll need to avoid them to successfully make your escape.
